channel.title: Pvm monsters
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
So im trying to make a pvm server just by adding monsters to the game.. But atm i dont know which monsters i can add...
So does anyone have any ideas?? (Im having a 667-718 source) Thanks, Kon

item.title: Pvm monsters
item.dc:creator: @MrSnow1 MrSnow1
item.description:
@MrSnow1 wrote:

go to you npc list , where you will find all your npcs,

You can add the npc’s wich have combats and health.
ex.

NPC CB HP
Guard 20 110

you cannot add
Farmer 0 0

because it does not have an cb and hp.

Read full topic
